Typography

Project in development

This project is currently in development. Please excuse the incomplete documentation while we continue working.

Application headings

All HTML headings, <h1> through <h6>, are available. .h1 through .h6 classes are also available, for when you want to match the font styling of a heading but still want your text to be displayed inline. Application headings use the Major Third type scale.

h1. Main title

h2. Subtitle

h3. Heading

h4. Subheading

h5. Mini Heading
h6. Micro Heading
Display headings

Traditional heading elements are designed to work best in the meat of your page content. When you need a heading to stand out, consider using a display heading—a larger, slightly more opinionated heading style. Display headings use the Perfect Fifth type scale.

Display 1

Display 2

Display 3

Display 4
